channel.title: IoT Card - EEPROM Programming Tool
channel.description: Hello, I have found on your Github a tool for generating IoT card EEPROM binaries from a YAML file and i would like to know if you also have a small program to flash the binaries from a mangOH RED / LEGATO. Thanks Best regards, Stephane

item.title: IoT Card - EEPROM Programming Tool
item.dc:creator: dfrey
item.description:
Originally, the idea was that the EEPROM contents would be used to automatically load the appropriate drivers and configure any hardware muxing required to use the card. That infrastucture has never really materialized. In my opinion the EEPROM format is not sufficiently rich to be able to setup every possible variety of device. As a result, the EEPROM contents are mostly just ignored today. If you want to write to the eeprom of a card, you can try to cross-compile eeprog and use that to write the eeprom. I have used that in the past.

Read full topic

item.title: IoT Card - EEPROM Programming Tool
item.dc:creator: sdatalpwan
item.description:
Hello,
I have found on your Github a tool for generating IoT card EEPROM binaries from a YAML file and i would like to know if you also have a small program to flash the binaries from a mangOH RED / LEGATO.
Thanks
Best regards,
Stephane
